raw_text: To compare relations in two instance sentences X, Y Culotta and Sorensen (2004) proposes to compare the subtrees induced by the relation arguments x 1, x 2 and y 1, y 2 ,i.e. computing the node kernel between the two lowest common ancestors (lca) in the dependecy tree of the relation argument nodes K DTK (X, Y)=? (lca (x 1, x 2) ,lca (y 1, y 2)) The node kernel? (u, v) is definend over two nodes u and v as the sum of the node similarity and their children similarity
